about_the_game:
Help Googoo take back his royal kingdom and save his family from the evil monsters in this gorgeous action-platformer! Bash your way through enemies and snatch enemy projectiles with Googoo's special shield-pack.

Features:

  • A unique shield-pack mechanic for quick and exciting gameplay
  • Stunningly beautiful pixel art graphics
  • An intriguing world filled with secrets to find and challenges to overcome
  • A soundtrack that's an absolute bop
  • Grow in strength and gain new abilities over time
  • If you play it you'll make our day :)
detailed_description:
Help Googoo take back his royal kingdom and save his family from the evil monsters in this gorgeous action-platformer! Bash your way through enemies and snatch enemy projectiles with Googoo's special shield-pack.

Features:

  • A unique shield-pack mechanic for quick and exciting gameplay
  • Stunningly beautiful pixel art graphics
  • An intriguing world filled with secrets to find and challenges to overcome
  • A soundtrack that's an absolute bop
  • Grow in strength and gain new abilities over time
  • If you play it you'll make our day :)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.12 or newer
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Video Memory
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

name: Googoo: Bash!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Video Memory
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Googoo: Bash! is an action platformer where you'll be bashing and snatching projectiles using Googoo's shield-pack! Help rescue the royal family by destroying the evil monsters and fearsome bosses that have taken over his sacred lands.
